title: Forum member identification tag
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180148im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Identify2_3644.jpg)

I'm trying to make a new member tag based on this image, and others like it. Unfortunately, someone else made this image, and I have no idea what that font is. I've tried automated font recognition already and searching through all the default fonts with no luck.

Save me, hahaha. The Forum lead Administrator is a good friend of mine, and I really wanna do this right for him.

Font: 

 Wild Ride by Michael Hagemann 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180148/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Mr.Yuck

comments.content: It's **[Wild Ride](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180148/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-2&ffam=Wild%20Ride%20-%20Regular&fid=695deb464bceb0aaaeafe173b1e759ca&fsize=60&text=Super%20Mod&fit=1)** free font by Michael Hagemann (2001)
You are my hero. Thank you from the bottom of my heart for finding that. Now I can finish this project right.
